sn38.7:1.5: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn38.7:1.7: “Atthi panāvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.7:1.8: “Atthi kho, āvuso, maggo atthi paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38.7:1.9: “Katamo panāvuso, maggo katamā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti?
sn38.7:1.10: “Ayameva kho, āvuso, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāya, seyyathidaṃ—
sn38.7:1.12: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, maggo ayaṃ paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāyā”ti.
sn38.7:1.13: “Bhaddako, āvuso, maggo bhaddikā paṭipadā, etāsaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ pariññāya.
